## Host.loading property

`true` if any extension in [Host.guests](./uix-host.host.guests.md) has created a [GuestServer](./uix-guest.guestserver.md)<!-- -->, but the Guest has not yet loaded.

**Signature:**

```typescript
loading: boolean;
```
